Reviews.Title: great value, great pictures.
Reviews.Author: WIShooter
Reviews.Content: My second lumix. Best point and shoot I have found. Fast shutter and great images every time. I am sticking with the Lumix over all others I have tested.

Reviews.Title: A lot easier to use than my Nikon
Reviews.Author: NONYA P. Trower
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best when needing to take fast pictures and easy to use. Having two small children, I cannot get them to wait 3 seconds before the picture focuses and takes a shot. This took the picture the minute I hit the button. It even takes the red out which I always experienced with on the Kodak. If I wanted to remove the red eye on the Kodak, I would have to wait 5 seconds for all the lights to flash before the shot. Then I used Nikon Coolpix thinking it would be better. The Nikon was not great at taking night pictures and the lens always seemed to get jammed. This camera is lighter than the other ones I have had. Great size and easily explains when to use all the different modes. I am not at all into technology and I can easily figure out how to use this camera. My problem if I have to read the manual, it is too complicated. This camera, I haven't picked up the manual yet. PICTURES ARE GREAT!

Reviews.Title: great digital camera
Reviews.Author: phonegirl
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased for my 6 year old grand-daughter.  When she was born, she had a stroke which affected her right side.  She loves to take pictures but the buttons are always on the right side and it needs her right index finger to work it.  When we turn the camera upside down, she can work it with her left thumb at the bottom left side.  This camera is very light and easy to work this way.  She loves the camera and has taken so many comical pictures of all of us.  It takes great pictures too.  I also love the type of battery and the charger that comes with the camera.  If she leaves it on,  it is easily charged up.  The priced was so reasonable.  Thanks for the opportunity to purchase this.

Reviews.Title: Lumix DMC-FH4 is a good buy.
Reviews.Author: coachwhy
Reviews.Content: This camera is very simple to operate and  capable of very nice photos.  The screen is crystal clear and the controls are straightforward.  I would buy the Lumix DMC-FH4 again.  As a matter of fact, I am considering getting a second one.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good camera...a few flaws
Reviews.Author: sbriggs
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy the photos and videos that this camera produces.  One thing I wish was different, the ability to zoom while taking video.  But it's still a great bargain for the price I paid...under $70.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Bobbi Jo"
Reviews.Content: If you aren't too technology inclined, this is a little too complicated. The instructions took forever to read. I like the camera and will probably master it eventually.
